name: Duck Race (itch)
description:
A tiny prototype I made after thinking "What if ducks had wheels?"

Run, jump and quack while trying to get the best time in the circuit!

Credits:

Engine sound: https://opengameart.org/users/qubodup

Music: https://opengameart.org/users/pheonton

Duck sound: https://www.sfxbuzz.com/
